resources.string:
"About this method

" "The cycleBeads App helps a woman use the Standards Days Method, a fertility awareness-based family planning method.

"
"The method was developed by the Institute for Reproductive Health at Georgetown University and is designed to be easy and effective way for womedn to plan or prevent pregnancy naturally.

"
"The CycleBeads app will help you track your cycle. 

"
"You can use it to prevent pregnancy. It's based on a scientific proven, family planning method that is +95% effective.

"
"Lets get started.

"
